wikipedia_page.main:
Keith Arthur Whitmore (born 15 June 1955) is a former British politician. He was a Liberal and later Liberal Democrat member of Manchester City Council for more than thirty years, retiring in 2012, and was also a member of the Committee of the Regions and the  Congress of the Council of Europe, of which he was President from 2010 to 2012.
He now chairs the Greater Manchester Transport Heritage Partnership and is active in other bodies with a similar focus.

response: Since 2018, the Bahamas Locomotive Society has been chaired by Alderman Keith Whitmore.Sam Hewitt, City Transport Expert is New Bahamas Chairman, heritagerailway.co.uk, 19 January 2018, accessed 2 July 2021

Mildon’s political career began when he was elected to the Provincial Council of Canakkale in the 1994 local elections. He became a member of the Congress of the Council of Europe in 1995 and served as President of its Chamber of Regions from 2004 to 2008 and as its President of Congress from May 2008 to October 2010, when he was succeeded by Keith Whitmore. He was also the head of the Turkish delegation to the Congress.
